I had 13 hours of sleep last night and feel like crap, so my posts 
might be a bit strange.

::Zardus/Bloodystrike/Reptilica/WarMachine::

Multiple shots along with small rocks hit the Alliance base's shield, 
Zardus looking calmly through the sandstorm. He motions for the 
others to stop firing, watching the autoguns, which worked on 
scanners instead of vision, continue to fire on Koj and Inu.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Bloodystrike stops firing, watching the sandstorm as he hears 
Reptilica crawl out from under the wood. Reptilica walks up near him, 
also holding his fire.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
WarMachine roars, rocks pelting him, but the gestalt not caring. 
Using scanners, he aims his weapons at Koj and Inu, opening fire with 
missiles and laser shots.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Alloran2@a... wrote:
> :::Treadshot/Hurricane:::
> 
> ::Treadshot transforms to tank mode and dodges the pellets. he lobs 
2 missles 
> at Koj. Hurricane transforms to beast mode and escapes the 
pellets.  he fires 
> 25 lightning bolts at Koj::
